text: Kare-ra wa, arrā ga tsukura reta kokumotsu to kachiku no ichibubun o kattena kūsō ni yotte (sonaete),`koreha arrā ni, soshite kore wa watashi-tachi no kamigami ni.' To iu. Daga kamigami ni sonaeta mono wa arrā ni wa tasshinai. Soshite arrā ni sonaeta mono ga, kare-ra no kamigami ni tassuru. Kare-ra no handan koso wazawaidearu
